title: Breast Cancer Detection
description: Developed a Breast Cancer prediction model using ADABOOST algorithm. Used Wisconsin Breast Cancer dataset.This model acheived 98 percent accuracy. After achieving high accuracy deployed it using Streamlit Application

title: Image Generation Using GAN Model
description: Developed a GAN using CycleGAN with ResNet and U-Net architectures to generate 7,000-10,000 Monet-style images,achieving higher accuracy with ResNet and improved generator loss with U-Net.

title: Demand Forecasting for Inventory Management
description: Developed a Python-based demand forecasting model with 93 percent accuracy using historical sales data and statistical techniques. Improved inventory optimization, reduced excess stock, and enhanced production planning for businesses.
